subject: Invitation to Interview for Marketing Coordinator Role at NovaTech Industries
body:
Hi Maya,

We were thrilled to review your resume and cover letter for the Marketing Coordinator position at NovaTech Industries. We believe you would be a fantastic fit for our team, and we'd love the opportunity to discuss this role further with you.

The interview is scheduled for Wednesday, March 20 at 2:00 PM EST and will be conducted via Skype. You will be meeting with Emily Patel, Director of Marketing, who will walk you through the day-to-day responsibilities of the position and answer any questions you may have.

Please let us know if this date and time work for you, or feel free to suggest alternative availability.

Best regards,
Ava Lee
Recruiting Coordinator
NovaTech Industries
intent: Invite the candidate to interview and confirm availability
